patthana14.4:4.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:4.2: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:4.3: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.4:5.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:5.2: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:5.3: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.4:6.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:6.2: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:6.3: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
